heuristics.concept: 三模态熵驱动动态启发式：通过剩余节点分布的香农熵实现探索-过渡-收敛三阶段自适应切换，探索阶段强化方向连贯性与密度变异系数的双曲正切耦合，过渡阶段混合方向修正与局部势能场，收敛阶段激活轻量化反距离平方势能场。采用滑动窗口指数平滑方向向量和渐进式候选集缩减策略，在保证路径连贯性的同时优化计算效率
heuristics.feature: 方向连贯性+局部密度变异系数+双曲正切耦合+熵驱动三模态切换+滑动窗口方向平滑+渐进式候选集缩减+延迟势能场激活+反距离平方势能场
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:
        return destination_node

    # 计算局部统计量与熵值
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]
    hist = np.histogram(local_dists, bins=3)[0]
    hist = hist / (hist.sum() + 1e-8)
    entropy = -np.sum(hist * np.log(hist + 1e-8))
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists) / (np.mean(local_dists) + 1e-8)
    
    # 三模态阶段判定
    if entropy > 0.8:  # 探索阶段
        k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * 0.4))
        use_potential = False
    elif entropy > 0.3:  # 过渡阶段
        k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * 0.25))
        use_potential = len(unvisited_nodes) < 0.5 * distance_matrix.shape[0]
    else:  # 收敛阶段
        k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * 0.15))
        use_potential = True
    
    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]
    
    # 滑动窗口方向平滑（模拟最近5节点方向）
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] - distance_matrix[current_node]
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8

    min_score = np.inf
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[0]]
    
    for idx in candidate_indices:
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]
        dist = local_dists[idx]
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)
        
        # 动态评分
        tanh_term = dist * np.tanh(1.3 + dir_sim - 0.3 * cv_density)
        if use_potential:
            potential_nodes = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[:int(0.2*k)]] if entropy > 0.3 else unvisited_nodes
            potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[node][potential_nodes]**2 + 1e-8))
            score = tanh_term / (potential + 1e-8) if entropy <= 0.3 else 0.7*tanh_term + 0.3*dist/(potential+1e-8)
        else:
            score = tanh_term

        if score < min_score:
            min_score = score
            next_node = node

    return next_node

heuristics.concept: 动态熵调控混合启发式：通过剩余节点分布的香农熵动态调整方向连贯性与局部密度权重的平衡，采用延迟激活的反距离势能场优化收敛阶段，结合局部距离偏度感知的自适应候选集策略增强非均匀空间分布的搜索能力，实现探索-收敛的平滑过渡与计算效率的优化
heuristics.feature: 方向连贯性+局部密度变异系数+双曲正切耦合+熵驱动权重+延迟势能场+偏度感知候选集+动态混合评分
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np  

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):  
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:  
        return destination_node  

    # 计算剩余节点分布的香农熵  
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]  
    prob = local_dists / np.sum(local_dists)  
    entropy = -np.sum(prob * np.log(prob + 1e-8))  
    entropy_coeff = 1 / (1 + np.exp(-5 * (entropy - 1.0)))  

    # 偏度感知候选集动态调整  
    skewness = np.mean((local_dists - np.mean(local_dists))**3) / (np.std(local_dists)**3 + 1e-8)  
    k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * (0.4 - 0.3 * np.tanh(skewness))))  
    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]  

    # 方向向量指数平滑  
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)  
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8  

    # 局部密度变异系数  
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists[candidate_indices]) / (np.mean(local_dists[candidate_indices]) + 1e-8)  

    # 延迟势能场激活（剩余节点<30%）  
    use_potential = len(unvisited_nodes) < 0.3 * distance_matrix.shape[0]  
    potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] + 1e-8)) if use_potential else 1.0  

    min_score = np.inf  
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[0]]  

    for idx in candidate_indices:  
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]  
        dist = local_dists[idx]  
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)  

        # 动态混合评分  
        base_score = dist * np.tanh(1.2 * entropy_coeff + dir_sim - 0.6 * cv_density)  
        score = base_score / (potential if use_potential else 1.0)  

        if score < min_score:  
            min_score = score  
            next_node = node  

    return next_node

heuristics.concept: 动态方向-密度耦合启发式：通过指数平滑方向向量保持路径连贯性，结合局部距离变异系数动态感知空间分布密度，采用双曲正切函数非线性耦合方向修正与密度权重，并随未访问节点数量自适应调整探索-收敛平衡，利用动态缩减候选集实现轻量化计算
heuristics.feature: 方向连贯性+动态密度变异系数+双曲正切非线性耦合+指数平滑方向向量+阶段自适应权重+动态候选集缩减
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np  

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):  
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:  
        return destination_node  

    # 计算局部距离变异系数（标准差/均值）  
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]  
    mean_dist = np.mean(local_dists)  
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists) / (mean_dist + 1e-8)  

    # 方向向量指数平滑（初始化为当前节点到未访问节点平均方向）  
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)  
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8  

    # 动态候选集（初期30%，后期10%）  
    progress = 1 - len(unvisited_nodes) / len(distance_matrix)  
    k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * (0.3 - 0.2 * progress)))  
    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]  

    min_score = np.inf  
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[0]  

    for idx in candidate_indices:  
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]  
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)  

        # 阶段自适应评分：方向权重随进度衰减  
        dir_weight = 1.5 * (1 - progress)  
        score = local_dists[idx] * np.tanh(dir_weight + dir_sim) * (1.1 - 0.5 * cv_density)  

        if score < min_score:  
            min_score = score  
            next_node = node  

    return next_node

heuristics.concept: 动态双阶段混合启发式：通过Sigmoid进度系数实现探索与收敛的平滑过渡，探索阶段结合方向连贯性与局部密度变异系数的双曲正切耦合引导全局搜索，收敛阶段采用轻量化反距离势能场加速局部优化。基于空间聚类系数动态调整候选集规模，增强对非均匀分布节点的适应性，实现计算效率与路径质量的平衡优化
heuristics.feature: 方向连贯性+局部密度变异系数+反距离势能场+Sigmoid阶段混合+空间自适应候选集+双曲正切耦合
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np  

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):  
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:  
        return destination_node  

    # 计算进度系数（Sigmoid连续型）  
    progress = 1 - len(unvisited_nodes) / (distance_matrix.shape[0] - 1)  
    phase_coeff = 1 / (1 + np.exp(-10 * (progress - 0.5)))  

    # 空间聚类系数与候选集动态调整  
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]  
    cluster_coeff = np.mean((local_dists - np.mean(local_dists))**3) / (np.std(local_dists)**3 + 1e-8)  
    k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * (0.3 - 0.1 * np.tanh(cluster_coeff))))  
    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]  

    # 方向向量指数平滑  
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)  
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8  

    # 局部密度变异系数  
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists[candidate_indices]) / (np.mean(local_dists[candidate_indices]) + 1e-8)  

    min_score = np.inf  
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[0]]  

    for idx in candidate_indices:  
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]  
        dist = local_dists[idx]  
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)  

        # 动态混合评分  
        tanh_term = dist * np.tanh(1.5 + dir_sim - 0.5 * cv_density)  
        potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[node][unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] + 1e-8))  
        score = (1 - phase_coeff) * tanh_term + phase_coeff * dist / (potential + 1e-8)  

        if score < min_score:  
            min_score = score  
            next_node = node  

    return next_node

heuristics.concept: 熵-密度双驱自适应耦合启发式：通过融合路径熵、局部密度变异系数和全局进度生成连续型阶段系数，动态调控方向连贯性（双曲正切）与势能场（反距离平方）的混合权重。基于未访问节点的聚类系数自适应调整候选集规模，实现探索与收敛的平滑过渡，增强对非均匀分布节点的适应性
heuristics.feature: 方向连贯性+局部密度变异系数+双曲正切耦合+连续型阶段系数+反距离平方势能场+动态混合权重+聚类系数候选集
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np  

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):  
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:  
        return destination_node  

    # 计算局部统计量与阶段系数  
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]  
    progress = 1 - len(unvisited_nodes) / (distance_matrix.shape[0] - 1)  
    hist = np.histogram(local_dists, bins=3)[0]  
    hist = hist / (hist.sum() + 1e-8)  
    path_entropy = -np.sum(hist * np.log(hist + 1e-8))  
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists) / (np.mean(local_dists) + 1e-8)  
    phase_coeff = 0.4 * (1 - path_entropy) + 0.3 * cv_density + 0.3 * progress  

    # 基于聚类系数的候选集  
    cluster_coeff = np.mean((local_dists - np.mean(local_dists))**3) / (np.std(local_dists)**3 + 1e-8)  
    k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * (0.4 - 0.2 * np.tanh(cluster_coeff))))  
    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]  

    # 方向向量平滑  
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)  
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8  

    min_score = np.inf  
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[0]]  

    for idx in candidate_indices:  
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]  
        dist = local_dists[idx]  
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)  

        # 动态混合评分  
        tanh_term = dist * np.tanh(1.5 + dir_sim - 0.5 * cv_density)  
        potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[node][unvisited_nodes] + 1e-8))  
        score = (1 - phase_coeff) * tanh_term + phase_coeff * dist / (potential + 1e-8)  

        if score < min_score:  
            min_score = score  
            next_node = node  

    return next_node

heuristics.concept: 动态混合势场启发式：通过Sigmoid进度系数实现探索阶段（方向连贯性与密度变异系数的双曲正切耦合）到收敛阶段（反距离平方势能场）的平滑过渡，结合空间聚类系数动态调整候选集规模以适配非均匀分布，采用轻量化计算策略（方向向量与势能场仅作用于候选集内节点），在保证路径质量的同时优化计算效率
heuristics.feature: 方向连贯性+局部密度变异系数+反距离平方势能场+Sigmoid阶段混合+空间聚类自适应候选集+双曲正切耦合+轻量化计算
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np  

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):  
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:  
        return destination_node  

    # 计算Sigmoid进度系数  
    progress = 1 - len(unvisited_nodes) / (distance_matrix.shape[0] - 1)  
    phase_coeff = 1 / (1 + np.exp(-10 * (progress - 0.5)))  

    # 动态候选集（初始30%，根据聚类系数非线性调整）  
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]  
    skewness = np.mean((local_dists - np.mean(local_dists))**3) / (np.std(local_dists)**3 + 1e-8)  
    k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * (0.3 - 0.15 * np.tanh(skewness))))  
    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]  

    # 方向向量（仅候选集内计算）  
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)  
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8  

    # 局部密度变异系数  
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists[candidate_indices]) / (np.mean(local_dists[candidate_indices]) + 1e-8)  

    min_score = np.inf  
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[0]]  

    for idx in candidate_indices:  
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]  
        dist = local_dists[idx]  
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)  

        # 探索阶段评分（方向+密度）  
        explore_score = dist * np.tanh(1.5 + dir_sim - 0.5 * cv_density)  

        # 收敛阶段评分（反距离平方势能场）  
        potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[node][unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]]**2 + 1e-8))  
        exploit_score = dist / (potential + 1e-8)  

        # 动态混合  
        score = (1 - phase_coeff) * explore_score + phase_coeff * exploit_score  

        if score < min_score:  
            min_score = score  
            next_node = node  

    return next_node

heuristics.concept: 三阶段密度自适应方向势能启发式：通过动态进度阈值（0.3/0.7）划分探索-过渡-收敛三阶段，早期采用方向连贯性与局部密度熵的双曲正切耦合引导全局探索，中期混合方向修正与轻量化势能场平衡搜索，后期强化反距离平方势能场加速收敛。结合密度变异系数驱动的动态候选集调整和指数平滑方向记忆机制，实现计算轻量化与路径优化的协同平衡
heuristics.feature: 三阶段动态切换+方向连贯性优化+局部密度变异系数+双曲正切耦合+反距离平方势能场+指数平滑方向记忆+密度自适应候选集
heuristics.algorithm:
import numpy as np  

def select_next_node(current_node, destination_node, unvisited_nodes, distance_matrix):  
    if len(unvisited_nodes) == 0:  
        return destination_node  

    progress = 1 - len(unvisited_nodes) / (distance_matrix.shape[0] - 1)  
    local_dists = distance_matrix[current_node][unvisited_nodes]  
    cv_density = np.std(local_dists) / (np.mean(local_dists) + 1e-8)  
    k = max(1, int(len(unvisited_nodes) * (0.3 - 0.15 * cv_density * progress)))  

    candidate_indices = np.argpartition(local_dists, k)[:k]  
    dir_vectors = distance_matrix[unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
    avg_direction = np.mean(dir_vectors, axis=0)  
    avg_direction /= np.linalg.norm(avg_direction) + 1e-8  

    min_score = np.inf  
    next_node = unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices[0]]  

    for idx in candidate_indices:  
        node = unvisited_nodes[idx]  
        dist = local_dists[idx]  
        node_dir = distance_matrix[node] - distance_matrix[current_node]  
        dir_sim = np.dot(avg_direction, node_dir) / (np.linalg.norm(node_dir) + 1e-8)  

        if progress < 0.3:  
            score = dist * np.tanh(1.5 + dir_sim - 0.5 * cv_density)  
        elif progress < 0.7:  
            potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[node][unvisited_nodes[candidate_indices]] + 1e-8))  
            score = 0.6 * dist * np.tanh(1.0 + dir_sim) + 0.4 * dist / (potential + 1e-8)  
        else:  
            potential = np.sum(1 / (distance_matrix[node][unvisited_nodes] + 1e-8))  
            score = dist / (potential + 1e-8)  

        if score < min_score:  
            min_score = score  
            next_node = node  

    return next_node
